short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and manage articles to read later

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
unRead is the perfect Chrome extension for those who wish there was an easier, more organized way to bookmark articles, blogs, videos, and other content. 

If you can select it, you can unRead it for later! With unRead, you can save all your interesting finds in one place and track the number of items you still need to catch up on. 

Whether it's an article to read or a video to watch, unRead makes it simple to keep everything organized and accessible for whenever you're ready to dive in!
